content: sand ov al hat gauge 16 sts x 20 row = 4 in stockinette sizes baby toddler child adult = 9 10 11 12 inches wide un-stretched abbreviations co = cast on drnd = decrease round k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together p = purl p2tog = purl two stitches together round = round sts = stitches directions with folded brim using long tail method co 56 64 72 80 sts place marker to join being careful not to twist the she makes hats signature hat this ribbed round 1 k 2 p 2 around cap can be made with or without a folded brim and fits just about any head perfectly repeat round 1 until hat measures 8 5 9 5 10 11 inches from co edge yarn shape crown 100 200 yards i love this yarn 100% acrylic 355 yards/325 meters per 198 grams switch to dpns when necessary needles drnd 1 k2 p2tog around us 9 / 5 5 mm 16 circular needle drnd 2 k2 p1 around us 9 / 5 5 mm double pointed needles drnd 3 k2tog p1 around drnd 4 k1 p1 around drnd 5 k2tog around notions drnd 6 k2tog around one stitch marker darning needle for weaving in ends ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ she makes hats -
